articles.description: Rapper Tupac Shakur to receive 2,758th star on Hollywood Walk of Fame on Wednesday

articles.title: ‘That ’70s Show’ actor Danny Masterson convicted of 2 counts of rape, faces life sentence - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Jurors have found "That '70s Show" star Danny Masterson guilty of two out of three counts of rape, and he could get 30 years to life in prison.
